On this page

AdSense Development & Testing Guide ‚Äã

üö® Important: AdSense Localhost Limitations ‚Äã

Google AdSense does NOT serve real ads on localhost for policy and security reasons. You need a public URL for testing.

üîß Development Setup Options ‚Äã

Option 1: GitHub Pages / Netlify Deployment (Recommended) ‚Äã

Deploy to a free hosting service for real testing:

  1. Build your site:
bash
npm run docs:build

  1. Netlify Drop:

    • Go to Netlify Drop
    • Drag the docs/.vitepress/dist folder
    • Get instant public URL

  2. GitHub Pages:

bash
# Push to GitHub and enable Pages in repository settings
git add .
git commit -m "Deploy for AdSense testing"
git push origin main
  1. Vercel:
bash
npx vercel --prod

üìã AdSense Account Setup Steps ‚Äã

1. Add Your Site to AdSense ‚Äã

  1. Go to AdSense Dashboard
  2. Click Sites ‚Üí Add site
  3. Enter your domain (use ngrok URL or actual domain)
  4. Verify ownership

2. Create Ad Units ‚Äã

  1. Go to Ads ‚Üí By ad unit

  2. Create different ad units:

    • Display ads for general content
    • In-feed ads for article lists
    • In-article ads for within content

  3. Copy the Ad slot IDs for each unit

3. Update Your AdSense Component ‚Äã

Replace the placeholder ad slot ID:

vue
<AdSense 
  ad-client="ca-pub-**********"
  ad-slot="YOUR_ACTUAL_AD_SLOT_ID"
  ad-format="auto"
/>

üß™ Testing AdSense Integration ‚Äã

Local Development Testing (No Real Ads) ‚Äã

bash
# Terminal 1: Start VitePress
npm run docs:dev

# Terminal 2: Create public tunnel
ngrok http 5173

What You'll See: ‚Äã

  • Localhost: Ad containers but no actual ads
  • Production URL: Real ads after site approval and content review

üìù Development Scripts ‚Äã

Your clean package.json scripts:

json
{
  "scripts": {
    "docs:dev": "vitepress dev docs",
    "docs:build": "vitepress build docs",
    "docs:preview": "vitepress preview docs"
  }
}

üîç Troubleshooting ‚Äã

No Ads Showing? ‚Äã

  1. Check Console: Look for AdSense errors
  2. Verify Publisher ID: Ensure ca-pub-********** is correct
  3. Check Ad Slot IDs: Must match your AdSense dashboard
  4. Site Status: Your site needs AdSense approval
  5. Content Policy: Ensure content meets AdSense guidelines

Development vs Production ‚Äã

EnvironmentReal AdsTesting Purpose
localhost:5173‚ùå NoComponent integration
Production domain‚úÖ YesRevenue generation

üöÄ Deployment for Real Testing ‚Äã

Quick Netlify Deployment ‚Äã

  1. Build your site:
bash
npm run docs:build

  1. The built files are in docs/.vitepress/dist/

  2. Drag the dist folder to Netlify Drop

  3. Get your Netlify URL (e.g., amazing-site-abc123.netlify.app)

  4. Add this URL to your AdSense verified sites

üìä AdSense Ad Unit Examples ‚Äã

Banner Ad (Top of Page) ‚Äã

vue
<AdSense 
  ad-client="ca-pub-**********"
  ad-slot="1111111111"
  ad-format="horizontal"
/>

Rectangle Ad (Within Content) ‚Äã

vue
<AdSense 
  ad-client="ca-pub-**********"
  ad-slot="2222222222"
  ad-format="rectangle"
/>

Sidebar Ad ‚Äã

vue
<AdSense 
  ad-client="ca-pub-**********"
  ad-slot="3333333333"
  ad-format="vertical"
/>

‚ö° Quick Start for AdSense Testing ‚Äã

Simple development workflow:

bash
# 1. Develop locally
npm run docs:dev

# 2. Build for deployment
npm run docs:build

# 3. Deploy to Netlify/Vercel/GitHub Pages
# 4. Add deployed URL to AdSense
# 5. Create ad units and replace slot IDs

Remember: Real AdSense revenue only comes from approved sites with genuine traffic!
